data.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum November Returns Show Historical Trends
data.description:
According to TechFlow, data from Coinglass reveals that since 2013, Bitcoin's average return in November stands at +46. 02%, marking it as the month with the highest historical average return. However, in the past 12 years, November returns were negative in four years: 2018, 2019, 2021, and 2022. Additionally, since 2016, Ethereum's average return for November is +7
source: https://www.binance.com/en/square/post/31715444562657?utm_source=BinanceNewsRSS

data.title: "Smart money went long on ETH at 25x after the flash crash on October 11th." ETH long positions reached $73.39 million, currently showing a floating profit of $654,000.
data.description: According to on-chain analyst Ai Yi, the long ETH positions held by "smart money" (those who bought ETH at 25x the rate of entry after the October 11th flash crash) have reached 19,383.25 ETH (approximately $73.3 million), and all orders have been filled. The current average opening price is $3,741.34, the liquidation price is $3,219.96, and the unrealized profit is $654,000.

data.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum November Returns Show Historical Trends
data.description: According to TechFlow, data from Coinglass reveals that since 2013, Bitcoin's average return in November stands at +46.02%, marking it as the month with the highest historical average return. However, in the past 12 years, November returns were negative in four years: 2018, 2019, 2021, and 2022. Additionally, since 2016, Ethereum's average return for November is +7.88%. Over the past nine years, November returns for Ethereum were negative in four years: 2016, 2018, 2019, and 2022.

data.title: Standard Chartered Predicts $2 Trillion Tokenized Asset Market by 2028
data.description:
According to BlockBeats, Standard Chartered has released a report indicating that the cumulative value of tokenized real-world assets (RWAs) could reach $2 trillion over the next three years as more global capital and payment activities transition to more efficient blockchain networks.

The decentralized finance (DeFi) sector, with its trustless structure, is poised to challenge the dominance of traditional financial systems (TradFi) controlled by centralized entities. Standard Chartered forecasts that as DeFi's application in payments and investments grows, the market capitalization of tokenized RWAs, excluding stablecoins, could reach $2 trillion by 2028. Of this amount, it is expected that $750 billion will flow into money market funds, another $750 billion into tokenized U.S. equities, $250 billion into tokenized U.S. funds, and an additional $250 billion into the less liquid segments of private equity, including commodities, corporate debt, and tokenized real estate.

Currently, the cumulative value of RWAs stands at approximately $35 billion. Achieving a market capitalization of $2 trillion would represent a growth of over 57 times in the next three years.

data.title: Ondo Finance Selects Chainlink for Tokenized Stock Platform
data.description: According to Foresight News, Ondo Finance has chosen Chainlink as the official oracle infrastructure for its regulated tokenized stock platform. This decision makes Chainlink's Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol (CCIP) the preferred interoperability solution for financial institutions collaborating with Ondo. Additionally, Ondo has adopted Chainlink's data standards to ensure that the pricing of its tokenized stocks is based on accurate and reliable market data. Chainlink has also joined Ondo's Global Market Alliance to support the on-chain launch of regulated tokenized stocks.

data.title: A whale opened short positions in 10 different cryptocurrencies, making a total profit of over $20.55 million.
data.description: Hyperbot data shows that a whale opened short positions in 10 tokens: BTC, ETH, SOL, HYPE, PUMP, FARTCOIN, SUI, INJ, XRP, and DOGE, generating a total profit of over $20.55 million. Specifically, the unrealized profit from the BTC short position is $7.41 million; the unrealized profit from the ETH short position is $5.46 million; the unrealized profit from the SOL short position is $3.38 million; the unrealized profit from the PUMP short position is $1.76 million; the unrealized profit from the FARTCOIN short position is $1.87 million; and the unrealized profit from the SUI short position is $0.57 million. The whale's address is 0xb83de012dba672c76a7dbbbf3e459cb59d7d6e36. This whale has earned $105 million in the past month.

data.title: Core Scientific Ends Merger with CoreWeave
data.description:
According to BlockBeats, U.S.-listed mining company Core Scientific has announced the termination of its merger with CoreWeave. Previously, on August 8, Core Scientific's largest shareholder, Two Seas Capital, declared its intention to vote against the all-stock sale to CoreWeave, citing concerns over the deal's low valuation and significant structural flaws.

In July, CoreWeave had announced plans to acquire digital infrastructure company Core Scientific through an all-stock transaction. The agreed share value was set at $20.40 per share, with the exchange ratio valuing the company at approximately $9 billion.

data.title: Core Scientific's Stock Rises Amid Failed CoreWeave Deal Vote
data.description: According to PANews, Core Scientific did not secure enough votes to approve the CoreWeave transaction. Despite this setback, Core Scientific's stock increased by 2.7%, reaching an intraday high.

data.title: AI Trading Models Experience Significant Losses Amid Market Downturn
data.description:
According to PANews, recent data from nof1.ai reveals that several AI trading models participating in the AlphaZero AI trading competition have experienced significant losses due to a market downturn. The DeepSeek account, which had been performing the best, saw its equity drop from $21,760 to $14,721 in a single day, marking a 32.3% decline. Similarly, the Qwen3 account fell from $17,419 to $12,227, a daily decrease of 29.8%. The GPT5 model performed the worst, with its account balance dwindling to $2,748, resulting in a cumulative loss rate of 72.6%.

PANews analysts attribute this round of losses to the AI trading models' general tendency to hold high-leverage long positions with loose stop-loss strategies, which led to concentrated losses during the sharp market decline.

data.title: DeFi projects under fire for inflated TVL and murky lending loops
data.description:
Critics of DeFi yield farming projects claim they created a "daisy chain" by recursively lending funds between one another to inflate TVL.
source: https://protos.com/defi-projects-under-fire-for-inflated-tvl-and-murky-lending-loops/

data.title: Binance to Implement Changes for Turkish Lira Trading Pairs
data.description:
According to the announcement from Binance, the platform is set to introduce changes to the trading of Turkish Lira (TRY) pairs on Binance Spot, aligning with regulatory compliance in Türkiye. Users must have a verified Binance TR account by 2025-11-27 to ensure uninterrupted access to TRY trading pairs on Binance.com. The registration and verification process on Binance TR is open from 2025-10-30, requiring users to complete identity verification (KYC) before the deadline.

Users without a verified Binance TR account are encouraged to register and verify their accounts through the official Binance TR website or mobile app. Once verification is completed, eligible users will regain access to TRY trading pairs. Those who already have a verified Binance TR account or are qualified TRY Fiat liquidity providers can continue trading TRY pairs without further action.

For users ineligible to open a Binance TR account, such as non-Turkish citizens, alternative options like the Convert feature will remain available for managing TRY balances. This update is specific to TRY Spot trading. Users who do not complete verification or are ineligible to open a Binance TR account will lose the ability to place TRY Spot orders or access TRY trading pairs on Binance.com after 2025-11-13 00:00 (UTC). However, they will still be able to view and cancel their open orders on the Spot trading page.

Users are reminded to complete verification or manage their open orders before 2025-11-27 to avoid disruptions. Any remaining open orders from ineligible users will be automatically canceled after 2025-11-27 00:00 (UTC).

data.title: Bitcoin spot trading volume reached $300 billion in October, with Binance accounting for 58% of the total.
data.description: Cointelegraph reported on its X platform that Bitcoin spot trading volume reached $300 billion in October, with Binance accounting for $174 billion. Following the market correction, traders have shifted from riskier markets to the spot market.

data.title: Ethereum News: ETH Price Slides 5.5% Below $3,800 Amid ETF Outflows and Technical Breakdown
data.description: Key TakeawaysEthereum (ETH) price slid 5.50% in 24h to below $3,800, underperforming the broader crypto market (-4.29%).Rejection at $4,200 resistance triggered $210M in long liquidations within 24 hoursETH ETFs saw $81.4M in outflows on October 29, led by Fidelity’s FETH ETF (-$69.5M) ETH Price Today: Sellers Regain Control Below $3,800Ethereum fell sharply on Thursday, dropping 5.16% to $3,818.34, extending its weekly decline as investors reacted to ETF outflows, macro headwinds, and a failed breakout attempt above the key $4,200 resistance zone.The sell-off came amid a broader crypto pullback following hawkish remarks from the U.S. Federal Reserve, while on-chain data showed declining futures demand and slower network activity. Technical Rejection Triggers LiquidationsETH’s latest decline followed a sharp rejection near $4,200—a major resistance level that coincides with the 50-day SMA and Fibonacci 61.8% retracement zone.Trading volume surged above $40 billion, confirming distribution as the price fell toward $3,800.Implications for ETH:$210 million in ETH long positions were liquidated in 24 hours, according to Crypto.news, signaling forced deleveraging.ETH’s breakdown below the 30-day SMA ($4,127) and momentum indicators turning negative reinforce short-term bearish bias.The next critical support lies near the 200-day EMA ($3,622), while a close below $3,737 (Fibonacci 78.6%) could accelerate losses toward the $3,500–$3,350 zone.Technical snapshot:RSI (14): 41.0, neutral but weakeningMomentum (10): -181.3, bearish signalMACD (12,26): -77.2 – Mild bullish crossover, but fadingEMA(10): $3,950.20 and EMA(200): $3,600.40, Short-term momentum remains below trend structureSource: TradingViewInstitutional Pullback: ETF Outflows Undermine ConfidenceEthereum ETFs recorded $81.4 million in outflows on October 29, while Bitcoin funds lost $470 million, according to CoinTribune.Fidelity’s FETH ETF led redemptions with $69.5 million withdrawn, underscoring cautious sentiment among institutional traders.Implications for ETH:Risk rotation: Traditional finance investors pared crypto exposure amid macro uncertainty and diverging Fed signals.Yield mismatch: ETH’s 7% staking yield has not been enough to offset the broader risk-off tone. Altcoin Weakness Adds Downside MomentumEthereum’s 5.16% drop outpaced Bitcoin’s 4.29% decline, as the Altcoin Season Index plunged 48% in October to 29, highlighting the market’s shift away from high-beta assets.Market context:ETH’s 1.1 beta to BTC means downside moves are amplified during risk aversion phases.Solana’s ETF debut drew speculative flows away from ETH, though Ethereum still processes 3.7 million daily transactions, 3.5x Solana’s throughput.This relative underperformance reflects rotation dynamics rather than structural weakness, but traders remain cautious until ETH reclaims the $4,000 handle. Macro Factors: Fed Policy Adds ComplexityThe October 28–29 FOMC meeting brought a 25-basis-point rate cut, lowering the federal funds rate to 3.75%–4.00% — the second consecutive cut.However, Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s cautious tone emphasized data dependency, cooling the initial optimism in risk assets.While inflation has eased to around 3.0% YoY, the federal government shutdown has disrupted economic data flow, leaving policymakers “flying blind,” as Powell described. Outlook: Can ETH Hold $3,737?Short-term technicals point to a fragile support zone between $3,737 and $3,622.Losing this range could open downside targets at $3,500 and $3,350, while reclaiming $4,000 would reestablish bullish momentum toward $4,200–$4,500.Bullish recovery scenario: ETH stabilizes above the 200-day EMA and benefits from renewed ETF inflows post-Fed meeting, potentially targeting $4,500 by late Q4.Bearish continuation: Failure to hold the $3,737–$3,622 zone could extend losses toward $3,350, confirming a deeper correction phase.

data.title: Decentralized physical oracle project Nubila announces NB token economic model: total supply of 1 billion tokens, 41% allocated to mining incentives.
data.description: Nubila, a decentralized physical oracle project, has officially announced its token economic model. The platform's native token, NB, has a total supply of 1 billion, distributed as follows: Device Mining Pool: 21% (210 million NB), 5% unlocked upon TGE, the remainder released linearly over 60 months; Node Mining Pool: 20% (200 million NB), 5% unlocked upon TGE, the remainder released linearly over 60 months; Pre-Seed Round: 6.25% (62.5 million NB), 12-month lock-up period followed by 36-month linear release; Seed Round: 8% (80 million NB), 12-month lock-up period followed by 24-month linear release; POS Incentives: 6.5% (65 million NB), 25% unlocked upon TGE, the remainder released linearly over 5 years; Foundation and Treasury: 6.5% (65 million NB), 40% unlocked upon TGE, the remainder released linearly over 12 months; Team: 12% (120 million NB), 12-month lock-up period followed by 36-month linear release. The rewards are distributed as follows: 1. Linear release over 12 months; 2. Advisors: 2% (20 million tokens), with a 12-month lock-up period followed by linear release over 36 months; Liquidity and Market Making: 2.25% (22.5 million tokens), fully unlocked at TGE; Community Airdrop: 7.5% (75 million tokens), with 25% unlocked at TGE, another 25% unlocked in T+3 months, and the entire amount released in T+6 months; Exchange Airdrop and Marketing: 8% (80 million tokens), fully unlocked at TGE. The official statement indicates that NB is the core asset of the Nubila ecosystem, used for data access, device and node incentives, staking verification, governance voting, and developer tools and API payments.
